name: alexpert
description: Alexpert - AI-powered sales training platform with intelligent voice agents and real-time analytics
author: Marc Antonio Schulz

scripts.version:major: npm version major && cd backend && npm version major && cd ../frontend && npm version major
scripts.version:minor: npm version minor && cd backend && npm version minor && cd ../frontend && npm version minor
scripts.version:patch: npm version patch && cd backend && npm version patch && cd ../frontend && npm version patch
